mapper.select: select id, project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, mapper_simple_class_name, mapper_method_name, sql_statement, table_seq, table_name, mapper_class_name from lv_invoke_mybatis_ms_table where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into lv_invoke_mybatis_ms_table(project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, mapper_simple_class_name, mapper_method_name, sql_statement, table_seq, table_name, mapper_class_name) values (#{projectId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{isDeleted}, #{mapperSimpleClassName}, #{mapperMethodName}, #{sqlStatement}, #{tableSeq}, #{tableName}, #{mapperClassName})

(#{entity.projectId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted}, #{entity.mapperSimpleClassName}, #{entity.mapperMethodName}, #{entity.sqlStatement}, #{entity.tableSeq}, #{entity.tableName}, #{entity.mapperClassName})

on duplicate key update project_id = values(project_id), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), is_deleted = values(is_deleted), mapper_simple_class_name = values(mapper_simple_class_name), mapper_method_name = values(mapper_method_name), sql_statement = values(sql_statement), table_seq = values(table_seq), table_name = values(table_name), mapper_class_name = values(mapper_class_name)
